pr_title: DHFPROD-4301: Uploading large file fails with no error

timeline.bodyText:
Might want to raise the max request slightly above 100MB to handle multiple files that add up to 100mb themselves, but fall a few bytes over the request limit.
Also, we may want to look at a better way than just to 'hang' the app while uploading a huge file. Most systems use a form of streaming service in the background, not rest, to gracefully handle a fileupload in the background.
timeline.author: aebadirad

replies.bodyText: @aebadirad - I can raise it to 105 MB approx. That should avoid such scenarios where the overall size of multiple files is slightly above the 100 MB limit.
replies.author: xnikhil08
